name: Brass Nataraja Idol
description: Handcrafted brass Nataraja idol made by traditional artisans using the ancient lost-wax casting technique. Each piece is unique and represents the cosmic dance of Lord Shiva.

name: Carved Teak Elephant
description: Intricately hand-carved teak wood elephant with traditional Rajasthani motifs. A symbol of wisdom and good fortune, perfect for home decor.

name: Banarasi Silk Tapestry
description: Handwoven Banarasi silk tapestry featuring traditional floral and paisley patterns with gold zari work. A masterpiece representing centuries of weaving tradition.

name: Brass Diya Lamp
description: Traditional brass oil lamp (Diya) with intricate engravings. Perfect for festive lighting and spiritual decor.

name: Antique Brass Vase
description: Vintage-style brass vase with hammered finish. Adds a touch of royal elegance to any interior space.

name: Brass Ganesha Statue
description: Detailed Ganesha statue seated on a lotus. A symbol of new beginnings and prosperity.

name: Brass Wall Panel
description: Decorative wall panel featuring brass figurines mounted on seasoned wood. A classic piece of Indian heritage.

name: Sandalwood Carved Panel
description: Exquisite sandalwood panel deep carved with mythological scenes. Emits a natural, soothing fragrance.

name: Kashmiri Wool Shawl
description: Authentic Kashmiri shawl with intricate needle embroidery (Sozni). Soft, warm, and timelessly elegant.

name: Marble Inlay Coasters
description: Set of 6 marble coasters with semi-precious stone inlay work, inspired by the Taj Mahal.

name: Hand-painted Blue Pottery
description: Famous Jaipur Blue Pottery plate featuring geometric and floral patterns in vibrant blue and white.
